ALTA Workshop 2013

The Eleventh Annual Workshop of the Australasia Language Technology Association

4–6 December 2013, Brisbane, Queensland

http://alta.asn.au/events/alta2013

Overview

This year, the Australasian Language Technology Association Workshop (ALTA) will be held at Queensland University of Technology, Brisbane from Wednesday 4 December to Friday 6 December. This event will be the eleventh annual installment of the ALTA Workshop in its most-recent incarnation, and the continuation of an annual workshop series that has existed under various guises since the early 90s.

ALTA 2013 will be held in conjuction with the 18th Australasian Document Computing Symposium 2013 (ADCS 2013).

Contact Information

If you'd like to get in touch with the technical co-chairs for ALTA 2013, please contact Karin Verspoor (karin.verspoor@nicta.com.au) and Sarvnaz Karimi (sarvnaz.karimi@csiro.au). For the local organizer please contact Laurianne Sitbon (laurianne.sitbon@qut.edu.au).
